pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.2: Atha kho devadatto yena kokāliko kaṭamodakatissako khaṇḍadeviyā putto samuddadatto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā kokālikaṃ kaṭamodakatissakaṃ khaṇḍadeviyā puttaṃ samuddadattaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.3: “etha mayaṃ, āvuso, samaṇassa gotamassa saṃghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabhedan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.6: Kathaṃ mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa saṃghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabhedan”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.7: “Etha mayaṃ, āvuso, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācissāma—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.8: ‘bhagavā, bhante, anekapariyāyena appicchassa santuṭṭhassa sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.9: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni anekapariyāyena appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya dhutatāya pāsādikatāya apacayāya vīriyārambhāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.12: yo gāmantaṃ osareyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.14: yo nimantanaṃ sādiyeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.16: yo gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.18: yo channaṃ upagaccheyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.20: yo macchamaṃsaṃ khādeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.22: Te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi janaṃ saññāpessāmāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.23: Sakkā kho, āvuso, imehi pañcahi vatthūhi samaṇassa gotamassa saṃghabhedo kātuṃ cakkabhedo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.1: Atha kho devadatto sapariso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho devadatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.5: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni anekapariyāyena appicchatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.7: Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhū yāvajīvaṃ āraññikā assu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.8: yo gāmantaṃ osareyya vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.9: yāvajīvaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ na khādeyyuṃ, yo macchamaṃsaṃ khādeyya vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.11: yo icchati āraññiko hotu, yo icchati gāmante viharatu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.12: yo icchati piṇḍapātiko hotu, yo icchati nimantanaṃ sādiyatu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.13: yo icchati paṃsukūliko hotu, yo icchati gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyatu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.14: Aṭṭhamāse kho mayā, devadatta, rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ anuññātaṃ, tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.17: “na bhagavā imāni pañca vatthūni anujānātī”ti haṭṭho udaggo sapariso uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.18: Atha kho devadatto sapariso rājagahaṃ pavisitvā pañcahi vatthūhi janaṃ saññāpesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.19: “mayaṃ, āvuso, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācimhā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.20: ‘bhagavā, bhante, anekapariyāyena appicchassa santuṭṭhassa sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.21: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni anekapariyāyena appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya dhutatāya pāsādikatāya apacayāya vīriyārambhāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.22: Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhū yāvajīvaṃ āraññikā assu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.23: yo gāmantaṃ osareyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.25: yo nimantanaṃ sādiyeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.27: yo gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.29: yo channaṃ upagaccheyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.31: yo macchamaṃsaṃ khādeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.33: Te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi samādāya vattāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.1: Tattha ye te manussā assaddhā appasannā dubbuddhino te evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.3: samaṇo pana gotamo bāhulliko bāhullāya cetetī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.4: Ye pana te manussā saddhā pasannā paṇḍitā byattā buddhimanto te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.5: “kathañhi nāma devadatto bhagavato saṃghabhedāya parakkamissati cakkabhedāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū devadattaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.10: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, devadatta, saṃghabhedāya parakkamasi cakkabhedāyā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.13: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṃghabhedāya parakkamissasi cakkabhedāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.16: “Yo pana bhikkhu samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkameyya, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.17: ‘māyasmā samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.18: Sametāyasmā saṃghena. Samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.19: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.20: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.8: “kathaṃ ime nānā assu, vinā assu, vaggā assū”ti pakkhaṃ pariyesati, gaṇaṃ bandhati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.20: aññehi bhikkhūhi. Ye passanti, ye suṇanti, tehi vattabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.21: “māyasmā samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.23: Samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.30: “māyasmā samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.32: Samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.41: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.43: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.46: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.48: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.49: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.54: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.56: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.57: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.59: Samanubhaṭṭho saṃghena itthannāmo bhikkhu tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.65: Saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.2: Dhammakamme vematiko na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
